text: Kananjalo aSizanga Sithumele nawuphi na uMthunywa okanye umprofeti ngaphambili kunawe Singamthumeleli ukuba athi xa ethetha (okanye ecengceleza) uShaytân ajule (ukungaqondakali kwento ayithethayo). Kodwa uAllâh Uyakutshabalalisa oko kujulwa nguShaytân. Ke kaloku uAllâh Wenza iiVesi zaKhe zithi Ngqo. Yaye uAllâh nguSolwazi, uSobulumko
